mapper.select: SELECT tab.table_name AS `name` , tab.table_comment AS `comment` FROM information_schema.tables tab WHERE tab.table_schema = #{schemaName}

SELECT tab.table_name AS `name` , tab.table_comment AS `comment` , col.column_name as `column_name` , col.column_type as `column_type` , col.column_default as `column_defaultValue` , col.is_nullable as `column_nullable` , col.column_comment as `column_comment` FROM information_schema.tables tab INNER JOIN information_schema.columns col ON tab.table_schema = col.table_schema and tab.TABLE_NAME = col.TABLE_NAME WHERE tab.table_schema = #{schemaName} AND tab.table_name = #{name}
